body_html: Actually setting an indivisible batch size works in my master branch, I recommend you to try it in your version. The document should clarify the ability to run with indivisible batch size anyway.

body: Actually setting an indivisible `batch size` works in my master branch, I recommend you to try it in your version. The document should clarify the ability to run with indivisible `batch size` anyway.
